thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Eugene Tiong
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Eugene Tiong

author: Eugene Tiong
title: Eugene Tiong
text:
heres some facts
low value item bought <$20AUD
waiting 2 months, nothing received
filled out webform on their website requesting a refund
next day they replied with some questions
went back to their email straight away
email back saying they would refund
paypal shows refund in progress next day
all in all, for something that was outside their control, they dealt with it quickly and professionally
